channel.title: datatables on An old coder
channel.description: Recent content in datatables on An old coder

item.title: Testing an App
item.description: What a crazy few days it has been. I have caught yet another cold which is a reminder of just how much a toxic germ factory a middle-school is as well as an example of why schools are such a horrible vector for covid infections. I haven’t done a lot in the last few days but on Friday I did post a test version of a web application that I have been working on.
